game.name: Depth Diver
game.genres: Action, Adventure, Indie, Strategy, Early Access
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, Full controller support, Adjustable Text Size, Camera Comfort, Color Alternatives, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Surround Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Depth Diver는 싱글 플레이와 협동으로 즐길 수 있는 어드벤처 게임입니다. 혼자 또는 친구들과 함께 위험한 바다로 잠수해 자원을 모으고 해저 시설을 수리하세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Depth Diver is a single-player and cooperative adventure game where you go on an underwater journey alone or with your friends to gather resources and repair underwater facilities in dangerous waters.
